InfoReplace:
false FC4 Open World: Attachment unlocker
Unlocks Attachments for weapons from the start. Also increases the available slots for attachments for each weapon.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Attachments for weapons are available in the shop from the start. [*] The number of attachment slots for weapons has been increased to the maximum amount of attachments that can be simultaneously applied e.g. shotguns and machine guns have two slots, while rifles and SMGs have 3. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] This mod is part of jvarnes' Open World Mod. [*] This mod is co-op friendly. [*] Before uninstalling this mod, ensure that [b]ALL[/b] weapons in the shop have zero attachments attached to them, even if the weapon is not in your inventory. [/list]
Credits: [list] [*] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/1251163][b]jvarnes[/b][/url][/size] [*] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Ported to the MI format by: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/71678078][b]Amichai-Oz Yannai[/b][/url][/size] [*] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Compatibility patches added by: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/32262030][b]LinkHero95[/b][/url][/size] [/list]
